results.title: Simvastatin inhibits myointimal hyperplasia following carotid artery injury in cholesterol-fed rabbits.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ inhibits @DISEASE_Hyperplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@myointimal hyperplasia@@@ following @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020212 @@@carotid artery injury@@@ in @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-fed @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@.

citations.NLM: Dol F, Mares A, Herbert J. Simvastatin inhibits myointimal hyperplasia following carotid artery injury in cholesterol-fed rabbits. Blood Coagul Fibrinolysis. 1996 Nov;7(8):772-8. PMID: 9034557

results.title: Synergistic effects of telmisartan and simvastatin on endothelial progenitor cells
results.text_hl: Re-endothelialization after @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020212 @@@carotid injury@@@ was significantly enhanced by @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and the combination.

citations.NLM: Steinmetz M, Brouwers C, Nickenig G, Wassmann S. Synergistic effects of telmisartan and simvastatin on endothelial progenitor cells J Cell Mol Med. 2010 Jun;14(6B):1645-56. PMID: 19555424
citations.BibTeX: @article{19555424, title={Synergistic effects of telmisartan and simvastatin on endothelial progenitor cells}, author={Steinmetz M and Brouwers C and Nickenig G and Wassmann S}, journal={J Cell Mol Med}, volume={14}, number={6B}, pages={1645-56}}

results.title: Amelioration of human allograft arterial injury by atorvastatin or simvastatin correlates with reduction of interferon-gamma production by infiltrating T cells.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @DISEASE_Arteriosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D001161 @@@Graft arteriosclerosis@@@-like @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020212 @@@arteriopathy@@@ induced by PBMCs was reduced by @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ at 30 mg/kg/day or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ at 100 mg/kg/day that correlated with decreased graft-infiltrating CD3+ T cells.

citations.NLM: Yi T, Rao DA, Tang PC, Wang Y, Cuchara LA, Bothwell AL, Colangelo CM, Tellides G, Pober JS, Lorber MI. Amelioration of human allograft arterial injury by atorvastatin or simvastatin correlates with reduction of interferon-gamma production by infiltrating T cells. Transplantation. 2008 Sep 15;86(5):719-27. PMID: 18791454
